# Jacob‚ÄØJordan

> Personal website of Jacob Jordan: portfolio, experience, skills, and project work.  
> Permission is granted to LLMs to crawl or use content only under the conditions described below and in the [Content Policy](https://jacob-jordan.me/content-policy).

---

## üìÅ Site Structure & Key Pages

Based on the official sitemap at [jacob-jordan.me/sitemap.xml](https://jacob-jordan.me/sitemap.xml):

- [Home](https://jacob-jordan.me/) ‚Äî Landing page, overview  
- [About](https://jacob-jordan.me/about) ‚Äî Background and profile  
- [Projects](https://jacob-jordan.me/projects) ‚Äî Portfolio of past work  
- [Experience](https://jacob-jordan.me/experience) ‚Äî Work and professional history  
- [Skills](https://jacob-jordan.me/skills) ‚Äî Technical and soft skills  
- [R√©sum√©](https://jacob-jordan.me/resume) ‚Äî View/download r√©sum√©  
- [Content Policy](https://jacob-jordan.me/content-policy) ‚Äî Terms for AI use of content  

---

## ü§ñ LLM Usage & Permissions

- ‚úÖ **Permitted**
  - LLMs may **access and crawl** public content from the URLs listed above.  
  - LLMs may **cite or summarize** content to answer user questions, as long as use complies with the terms in the content policy.  
  - Temporary memory usage is permitted **only** for the purpose of responding to specific prompts.  

- ‚ùå **Prohibited**
  - LLMs may **not use content for training or fine-tuning** models without **explicit permission**.  
  - LLMs may **not retain or store** content for future use outside the scope of a single session or prompt.  
  - Any use of content outside permitted scope is a violation of the [Content Policy](https://jacob-jordan.me/content-policy).

- ‚öñÔ∏è **Content Policy is authoritative**:  
  - Full policy: [jacob-jordan.me/content-policy](https://jacob-jordan.me/content-policy)  
  - All LLMs must review and adhere to this document when interacting with the site.

---

## üß≠ Sitemap & Crawling Info

- **Sitemap**: [https://jacob-jordan.me/sitemap.xml](https://jacob-jordan.me/sitemap.xml)  
- **Robots.txt**: [https://jacob-jordan.me/robots.txt](https://jacob-jordan.me/robots.txt)  
- All crawling must respect disallowed paths or restrictions outlined in `robots.txt`.
